summary.description:
Highly multiplexed immunofluorescence images and single-cell data of immune markers in tonsil and lung cancer.

ASHLAR: Alignment by Simultaneous Harmonization of Layer/Adjacency Registration.

On Linux, installation is fairly straightforward, but you must first install your distribution's development package for libfftw3 and a JDK (any one of versions 1.6, 1.7 or 1.8). You will also have to manually run pip install numpy before pip install ashlar due to a requirement of one of the required packages.

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'HistoCAT', 't-CyCIF', 'immunofluorescence', 'cyclic immunofluorescence'
